entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 7 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 14 except 7 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 28 April 2023
